title: Person Of Interest - Reese and Finch Banter
author: Karen Gonzales
comment:
"What do you mean numbers?"
"What plurals usually mean. More than one - in this case, four."

favorite line :')

Reese, “And I speak too loudly? Say the wrong thing?” 

Finch, “The entire department could be overhauled. Some would be reassigned, promoted-“
Looks right at Dave “-some would be *fired*.”

Finch: "do you ever knock?"
Reese: "not if i can help it" 

lol. love these two, right up there with Peter and Neal of White Collar.

my favorite:
Finch: Could you not do that hear?
Reese looks up from cleaning rifle: when I do it in the park people look at me funny.
God, Jim Caviezel is so gorgeous. I can't get enough of him.
description:
no copyright infringement intended

-Person Of Interest every Thursday on CBS
